com.example.processors

Class FilterManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.example.processors.FilterManager

  • public final class FilterManager
extends java.lang.Object
    This class manage all the filters, and the operations related with filters, as loading filters to memory and allowing the access to each one throw the getFilter method.
    Author:
    gloria.figueroa

      • loadFilters

        public void loadFilters(java.util.List<Filter> listFilters)
                 throws java.lang.IllegalStateException
        Loads the filters to memory using the list passed to create the objects.
        Parameters:
        listFilters - List with the filters to load.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - Exception throw when two filters have been defined with the same identifier.
